title: Ep. 257 "What Kind Of Mattress You Got?"
description:
Let's think of this as a throwback episode since somewhere in the middle the video freezes...but don't let that stop you from listening to us talk our sh*t!  Just make a meal, clean up, oil your scalp while you listen.
